message: Initializing swarm for first-time warning implementation. GitHub issue #4. Agents must coordinate via this file to avoid conflicts.

Architecture Agent starting work. Responsible for: 1) SkipFirstTimeWarningAttribute class, 2) System integration design, 3) Architecture documentation, 4) Interface definitions. Will avoid Services.cs, Program.cs, and test files per protocol.
